abstract: Fox claimed victory in the ratings on Wednesday, according to Nielsen’s estimates, as 22.1 million viewers tuned in at 9 p.m. to watch Brooke White be eliminated from “American Idol,” leaving four remaining contestants.
lead_paragraph: Fox claimed victory in the ratings on Wednesday, according to Nielsen’s estimates, as 22.1 million viewers tuned in at 9 p.m. to watch Brooke White be eliminated from “American Idol,” leaving four remaining contestants.

headline.main: Wednesday’s ‘Idol’ Is Again a Ratings Breakout
